website_summaries.verdict: This book highlights the impressive range of appetizing gluten-free meals and snacks that anyone can easily craft with the help of an Instant Pot.
pros: 175 simple instant pot based gluten-free recipes
Examples include bacon maple baked beans, pumpkin custard, and upside-down cake
cons: All recipes require an Instant Pot

customer_reviews.title: cooking times seem wrong
customer_reviews.text: I've tried the sausage, egg and cheese muffins, the zucchini bread and the raspberry cake, as well as the whole chicken, and they all came out under-cooked when I followed the recipes. I'm not sure if it's something I'm doing wrong, but I have to finish them off in my toaster over. Really disappointed so far, even though I love my Instant Pot. Anyone have any suggestions? Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: GILLIAN

customer_reviews.title: Read manual instructions carefully( on line) chapter one of book summarizes basic instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Recipes are easy to follow and most use basic ingredients. Book is geared for 6qt pot. Most of the recipes can be modified for my 3 at mini. I recommend the book.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about having this book and eager to jump right in and try the recipes and as I was flipping through the pages I noticed a total of 15 pages missing!! Bummer!! Returning ASAP! 😞
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good GF recipes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a family member that is GF. She said there were a lot of good looking recipes, so hopefully they come out as good as they look!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: This had a ton of great recipes to choose from that are family friendly and budget friendly! Nothing too weird or ingredients I wouldn't be able to find at my local grocery store. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Miller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift
customer_reviews.text: My best friend and I are both celiac and when she seen this she flipped. She loves it already!
customer_reviews.author: Caneshia e.

customer_reviews.title: Yummmmmm
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful variety of recipes that are easy to make and even appeal to my picky eaters .
customer_reviews.author: CZRayne

customer_reviews.title: Excited
customer_reviews.text: Really great cookbook. Lots of good recipes I’m very excited to try out.
customer_reviews.author: marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom for her birthday and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Good I think
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s good. I got it for my mom and I saw her reading it the other day which is a good sign
customer_reviews.author: Emily Heiss

customer_reviews.title: Hope you like fat, mushroom soup, hot spices, and meat. You will love this book if you do.
customer_reviews.text: The recipes in this book are not for healthy eating in my view. My husband bought me this and it is a total waste. I intend to return it despite its low price. Many of the recipes can be made on top of the stove quicker and easier. It appears they took regular recipes and slow cooker recipes and tried to make them gluten free. Tell me where I will find gluten free orzo? Where will I find GF mushroom soup? Maybe if I was 21 and didn't care about a healthy diet I would like this but I'm not. Also, need specialty silicone cupcake liners among other special utensils. Not worth the work.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gluten-Free/Instant Pot Book
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cookbook full of recipes and gorgeous pictures that will make your mouth water. The recipes are easy to make and so much better for you than processed/take-out food. In addition to the recipes, the author includes useful information about Instant Pot pressure cookers. (I received the book from the publisher, but this is my personal opinion.)
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Self

customer_reviews.title: Michelle nails it again!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of Michelle and her cookbooks since the beginning. While I do not have a gluten intolerance issue, I love to cook (and eat) so I'm always looking for different ways to prepare the same food. This cookbook, just like the others is adventurous but approachable. My Instantpot rarely leaves my counter so I am always looking for something new and different to cook. This cookbook is a welcomed addition to my cookbook family.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Ton of recipes!
customer_reviews.text: Great book for anyone avoiding gluten - lots of recipes and lots of variety.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Can’t begin using my cookbook without basic knowledge.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t find any information online or in the book for what size Instant Pot these recipes are for. Very confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Laney

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: This book provides easy to use and understand recipes. It also provides exciting and usual recipes. It is an unusually fun cookbook to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Carpenter

product_meta.title: The "I Love My Instant Pot®" Gluten-Free Recipe Book: From Zucchini Nut Bread to Fish Taco Lettuce Wraps, 175 Easy and Delicious Gluten-Free Recipes ("I Love My" Series)
